main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactSecurity] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:51:11 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblFactSecurity]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblFactSecurity]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactSecurity] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:51:11 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblFactSecurity]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimSecurityID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimOrganisationID] [int] NOT NULL, [DimReportingDateID] [int] NOT NULL, [SecurityNo] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [SecurityValuationAmt] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [SecurityValuationDate] [datetime] NULL, [IsIncluded] [bit] NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_tblFactSecurity] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimPoolID] ASC, [DimSecurityID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
